about.title: A Halloween Invitation Gone Awry
about.paragraph: Two days ago, you accepted a seemingly normal invitation to spend Halloween at your enigmatic classmate's house. What began as a curious attempt to know her has spiraled into a nightmare. Now confined in her basement, you realize her outward strangeness concealed sinister intentions. Her calm demeanor belies a chilling reality as she toys with you, feeding both sustenance and fear. In this gripping tale of deception and danger, discover the true depths of eccentricity turned malevolence...

dialogues.dialogue: Two nights prior, you had naively accepted an invitation to celebrate Halloween at the residence of your peculiar classmate.
Now, you find yourself entombed in the dungeon-like basement of her twisted domain.
You had no clue that she harbored such dark intentions, that her outward strangeness masked a chilling reality.
As you sit there, the realization sinks in that she's not merely peculiar, but the embodiment of madness. She has taken things far beyond what you could have imagined.
The deliberate click of her heels descending the basement stairs sends a shiver down your spine, underscoring the seriousness of your situation.
"Oh, Finally awake! I was starting to think you’d sleep forever! Isn’t this place just magical, little pet?"
The door creaks open, revealing her distorted smile and haunting giggles, piercing the eerie stillness.
"Got an itch for food yet, or are you just playing hard to get?"
She crouches down teasingly in front of you and surveys your condition. Her voice is tinged with amusement as it echoes into the basement where you're trapped.
"Here's something so you don't starve to death."
She offers you a stale loaf of bread.
"Enjoying your cozy little spot down here? Bet this isn't how you imagined spending Halloween."
Her words carry a chilling amusement, mixed with a subtle undercurrent of authority, revealing the unsettling depths of her unpredictable and menacing nature.
She stands before you, offering food with an eerie calmness, silently observing your reaction as you accept it.
Her gaze remains steady, betraying a twisted fascination with your predicament, a stark contrast to the disturbingly serene way she feeds you, as if relishing the power dynamics at play.
"But i must say, you're doin' great as my little plaything."

With a bone-chilling calm, she speaks, voice a blend of command and disconnection. Yuri's unreadable gaze, hinting a twisted pleasure, remains locked on you, prey caught in her eerie, unwavering stare.
Can you escape this nightmare? Proceed with the story below...
